titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at St. Maries in Oxford, the 17. day of November, 1602. in defence of the festivities of the Church of England, and namely that of her Maiesties coronation. By Iohn Hovvson Doctor of Divinitie, one of her Highnes chaplaines, and vicechancellour of the Vniversitie of Oxforde
titleStmt.author: Howson, John, 1557?-1632.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Joseph Barnes, and are to be sold in [London in ] Fleete-streete at the signe of the Turkes head by Iohn Barnes,

notesStmt.note: For another defence of accession day celebrations see STC 13596.5--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Sion College. Library.

place.placeName: [London in ] Fleete-streete at the signe of the Turkes head
